action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X X ▢ X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with Xs in the third row at the first, second, fourth, and fifth positions. All other positions are empty (▢).

The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ X ▢
X X ▢ X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 matrix with Xs and empty squares. The first row has an X in the first position followed by four empty squares. The second row has an X in the fourth position with the rest being empty squares. The third row has Xs in the first, second, fourth, and fifth positions, with an empty square in the third position. The fourth and fifth rows are entirely empty squares.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with Xs in the third row at the first, second, fourth, and fifth positions. All other positions are empty (▢).
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any Xs in the first or second rows of your grid?

This is my DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 matrix with Xs and empty squares. The first row has an X in the first position followed by four empty squares. The second row has an X in the fourth position with the rest being empty squares. The third row has Xs in the first, second, fourth, and fifth positions, with an empty square in the third position. The fourth and fifth rows are entirely empty squares.
QUESTION: Are there any Xs in the first or second rows of your grid? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any Xs in the fourth or fifth rows of your grid?

QUESTION: Are there any Xs in the fourth position of the second row in your grid?

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your grid and the other grid described the same?  Write "DECISION: same grid" if you think they are the same grid or "DECISION: different grids" if you think they are different grids. Do not add anything else.
